author: lacton
msg: Removed unwanted output during test runs

author: jdcasey
msg: Re-adding backward-compat support for envar access via ${ENVAR} in addition to ${env.ENVAR}.

author: lacton
msg: The tests are divided between those that are specific to Cobertura (cobertura_spec.rb) and those that should be true for most test coverage tool (test_coverage_spec.rb).
Changed 'sandbox.rb' so that loading the Cobertura addon does not affect other tests (i.e., the sandbox removes the Cobertura callbacks).  Otherwise, some tests fail for wrong reasons.

author: lektran
